Introduction

Blue Fox is a girl group under Blue Fox Entertainment. They debuted on October 12, 2018, with the single "I Believe I Can Fly". On November 27, 2019, the group posted a photo on their official Instagram revealing that they had gone through a line-up change, later on, it was also confirmed that members: Aria, Daya and Hae Na, left the group for unknown reasons.

On September 5, 2022, the group announced that they had disbanded due to personal and health issues. They became active again only 12 days after their disbandment as they were seen performing as a group again on September 17, 2022. They continued to have more appearances at multiple festivals and concerts afterwards. The lineup currently consists of Yeonji and Ayeon. However, they are assumed to have yet again disbanded, as Ayeon was found to have joined Taiwanese agency TEN Entertainment and girl group GENBLUE.
